title: Heart Seeker Akali, I REALLY love the clothing.
body:

Artist: http://dutomaster.deviantart.com/

**IMPORTANT MESSAGE: Please don't put her splash art in a group kind of theme, keep it individual like you did with Varus, Ashe, and Vayne. PLEASE!**

UPDATED: 12/21/15

Why not adults too?

i see boobs on my main I UPVOTE THE HELL OUTTA THAT

"So many boobs, will match making ever find true balance?"
Boobs are the path to true balance

> [{quoted}](name=Madoka KanameSan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IskLIZyy,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-12-21T17:40:50.933+0000)
>

^I know a girl who had/has a messed up back because of her boobs. Balance.
That's why Small Boobs (like mine!) Are more fun! :D
Why do I get the feeling you're a guy?
Idunno. Believe what you will, But Preeeetty sure I'm a girl.
Im not sure of anything. I think I'm a guy- but I could be a genderless blob in a coma- and this is just a dream..
We're all machines and this is a program made so we can understand human emotion so that when we come out we won't kill humanity on sight
Good, but too much chest

> [{quoted}](name=Warchief Rylon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IskLIZyy,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-21T15:37:08.753+0000)
>
> Good, but too much chest

Rarely is there ever such a thing. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
It's funny because Jinx has none
No really look at it and tell me it's attractive OR cute OR normal OR looks serious.
Ok. It's attractive. What more do you want?

HOW ON EARTH
http://1.media.dorkly.cvcdn.com/50/27/0d41808f60af8871fa122b3b0f37ab1b.gif
Attractiveness is a subjective thing. If someone were to be wearing that with that physical figure I would find myself attracted to it. Need any more explanation?

Well first off the drawing is highly unnatural, so to me being attracted to the drawing specifically sounds like a fetish, a paraphilia.
And if you saw that on a real person, how could you accept it? How could you be OK with it? Why doesn't your consciousness brickwall your animality?

It is a fictional piece designed to appeal to males. It does for plenty of people. And how could I accept it? Why wouldn't I? I don't get to choose what other people wear or do/don't do. I wouldn't like go ballistic and start drooling or some shit, but I wouldn't condemn the person for wearing it, because at the end of the day it's their choice.
It's sexy.
I find it ironic that you used a Jinx sticker...
Nothing wrong with a bit of fan services
ಠ_ಠ
what? fans service hurts no one and its all just for entertainment and good fun

1. It hurts culture
2. It's ugly since it clashes with the point of entertainment
3. It forces you to hide while doing otherwise normal activities

1. It hurts culture only when fanservice overshadows everything else

2. Fanservice is entertainment

3. Now cmon, this is anything lewd. In a game that is focused on something totally diffetent as long as you don't play it.

A bit of fanservice is not bad. Only or too much fanservice is bad.

Also, to be honest, that is not even that much fanservicey. Ok, womans have boobs, what a surprise. Some even have a good looking cleavage with dresses that fits that, what a surprise again. And it is sexy, already, but in a way that fits the character.

But among all the fanservicey things out there, this is good looking, measured and fitting.
Couldn't be heartseeker, but could work for a Valentine's day themed skin

> [{quoted}](name=Avantel,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IskLIZyy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-21T11:10:17.851+0000)
>
> Couldn't be heartseeker, but could work for a Valentine's day themed skin

Not sure how *that* wouldn't be heartseeker.

But I would have to break my oath of never buying rp again if it did come out.

The idea is that Heartseeker is restricted to marksmen, and more notably those with bows: Vayne, Ashe and Varus.

Ezreal, Jayce, Vi and Galio are Debonair for their Valentine's Day-themed skins.

Annie's is Sweetheart. (And you can't argue it's due to the sexualization of Heartseeker, because Varus is wearing a diaper.)

If Akali joins any of those collections, it would be Sweetheart, but Riot would probably make a new name for her instead.
Who the hell is Galio? New champion?
Nah, it's a low, flat ship with one or more sails and up to three banks of oars, chiefly used for warfare, trade, and piracy.
I am sorry good sir, but I believe you are mistaken, I think what you are referring to is a Galleon. Galio is a renowned Italian Astronomer.
I am sorry good sire,but I believe you were talking about Galileo.Galio is a place where they used to hang people.
I'm afraid you're a little off, ther. They used to hang people at the Gallows. Galio is a Large celestial body comprised of Millions of stars orbiting a central axis point.
That's a galaxy you're thinking of, friend. Galio is a casual term used for girls and women.

> [{quoted}](name=Sakuyahime,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IskLIZyy,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-21T12:41:33.749+0000)
>
> The idea is that Heartseeker is restricted to marksmen, and more notably those with bows: Vayne, Ashe and Varus.
> 
> Ezreal, Jayce, Vi and Galio are Debonair for their Valentine's Day-themed skins.
> 
> Annie's is Sweetheart. (And you can't argue it's due to the sexualization of Heartseeker, because Varus is wearing a diaper.)
> 
> If Akali joins any of those collections, it would be Sweetheart, but Riot would probably make a new name for her instead.

I'm willing to bet that the main reason annie is a sweetheart and isn't a heartseeker is because of her age.

The heartseeker does make more sense when you think of cupids and arrows, however. Heartbreaker Akali, maybe?
they'd have to split the hearts on her weapons and make her face a little more intense than this picture, but I like that idea.

> [{quoted}](name=Ultraboomer,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IskLIZyy,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-21T18:18:51.463+0000)
>
> they'd have to split the hearts on her weapons and make her face a little more intense than this picture, but I like that idea.

Or they could not and it would still work ;)

"I REALLY love the clothing"

*looks at chest area*

I wonder why https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1ae02c864513b71b0aefbd50cedc32afb1720fd9/68747470733a2f2f6769742e696f2f3448656164

She's like twice as tall as she should be. With boobs twice as big. -_- Fix those two things and I kind of like the general idea but don't think she should be in heals and would prefer a mischievous look on her face over the one she has in this picture.
Clearly you don't remember sideboob Akali. This is actually pretty modest.

That was the biggest nerf to any champion in the history of league of legends. Even Olaf and Evelynn have nothing compared to the extreme nerf of sideboob Akali.

I request a moment of silence.

Agreed.  Breasts are way too large.  The weapons look a bit silly as well - keep the heart shape, but leave them open so it looks more like her actual weapon.  High heels are very unrealistic as well.
Leona has high heels, and she is just about the least fanservice-ey (....I guess...whatever) out of all the human females. Even her Pool Party skin has her in a modest one piece.
I don't care about high heels in terms of fan service. I care because it looks stupid and goofy and makes no sense with how Akali moves.
Neither do Leona's heels, yet she is still able to move in them.

From my response to your other comment: "Except that Leona doesn't fight anything like Akali and honestly shouldn't be in heels either. One bullshit does not justify a second bullshit."

With one addition in terms of looks: At least they look much more appropriate to Leona's outfit (on her base skin).
